argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | unitmulcl.1 | |- U = ( Unit ` R ) |
| 2 |  | unitgrp.2 | |- G = ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s U ) |
| 3 |  | unitgrp.3 | |- .1. = ( 1r ` R ) |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_1unit | |- ( R e. Ring -> .1. e. U ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 6 | 5, 1 | #P_unitss | |- U C_ ( Base ` R ) |
| 7 | 2, 5, 3 | #P_ringidss | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ U C_ ( Base ` R ) /\ .1. e. U ) -> .1. = ( 0g ` G ) ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_mp3an2 | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ .1. e. U ) -> .1. = ( 0g ` G ) ) |
| 9 | 4, 8 | #P_mpdan | |- ( R e. Ring -> .1. = ( 0g ` G ) ) |
